1164970.name: Dogs of Wallstreet
1164970.description:
Dogs of Wall Street is fast-paced party game where you play a group of dogs playing the market to be top dog!

Buy and sell stocks to gain the most money before the end of the match and claim the crown. But it's not as simple as just being a frugal pup! Negate, reverse, and multiply item effects in addition to the already volatile market, and watch the chaos of Wall Street unfold!

  • Straightforward controls allow anyone to join in!
  • Easy for newcomers to jump in, but enough depth to keep you coming back.
  • Play with up to 4 players.
  • Unlock new characters through play
  • Bark!
  • Use abilities and quick planning to build a strategy.
  • Loads of options to let you customize a game-type to your liking (limited buys, super speed, etc.)
1164970.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
